function.name: create_four_panel_comic
function.description: Create a four-panel comic based on a specified theme, with punchlines and detailed content for each panel.

theme.description: The central theme of the comic.

punchlines.description: Three lateral-thinking punchlines related to the theme.

selected_punchline.description: The chosen punchline that appeals to men and women in their 20s.

actions.description: The actions taking place in the panel.

state.description: The state of characters or environment in the panel.

character.description: The name of the character speaking.

speech.description: The dialogue of the character. Output in Japanese.

inner_thoughts.description: The inner thoughts of the character, if any. Output in Japanese.

dialogue.description: The dialogues and inner thoughts of characters in the panel.

drawing_prompt.description: Detailed description for AI to draw the panel, avoiding abstract descriptions and including specific details like materials, colors, and attire names. Be sure to specify a Japanese anime style for the drawing style.

panels.description: The content for each of the four panels.

title.description: The title of the comic in Japanese.
